kai: Mafi yawan suna don wakiltar misali na yanzu na aji a cikin hanya
shigo da: Yana shigo da code daga wasu kayayyaki
daga: Yana shigo da takamaiman sassa daga tsarin
kamar yadda: Yana ba da samfuri ko abu da aka shigo da shi abin laƙabi
lissafin fahimta: Tsari don ƙirƙirar jeri a cikin layi ɗaya
f - zaren: Yana tsara kirtani tare da masu canji
yanka: Hanyar cire sassan kirtani ta amfani da fihirisa
doka: Takardun bayanai da aka haɗe zuwa aiki ko aji
a tsaye hanya: Hanyar da ba ta da damar shiga aji ko halayen misali
hanyar aji: Hanyar da ke karɓar wannan a fakaice a matsayin siga na farko
hanyar misali: Hanyar da ke karɓar misalin a fakaice azaman siga na farko
nusaiba: Wani sanannen ɗakin karatu na Python wanda da farko yana ba da babban matakin, ayyukan lissafin tsararru.
tkinter: Ginin ɗakin karatu don ƙirƙirar GUI
ma'aikacin walrus: Ma'aikacin da ke ba da izinin farawa mai canzawa a cikin toshe bayani
duka: Sunan canjin duniya da ake amfani da shi a cikin fakiti waɗanda ke ƙayyadaddun samfuran da za a fallasa su ga shigo da kati
args: Sunan laƙabi da aka ba wa gardama marasa maɓalli na sabani
kwargs: Sunan laƙabi da aka ba da gardama na maɓalli na sabani
yankan gaba: Mai raba hali don buƙatar gardama zuwa hagunsa don zama hujjar matsayi
alama: Mai rarraba haruffa ya zama mahawara ta maɓalli
